author: mikerah
content: I'm not sure if this is the right channel to ask but I'm looking to steward this EIP (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/603) or this one (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/1829/files?short_path=07ea30f#diff-07ea30fae423fa7a378e71cd76a29ffa2f67f3ffeaae194a38ae8097e9fc1edd) but I'm not sure what the next steps are

author: sky.cactus
content: For ECADD/ECMUL, next step would be to create an EIP.  Right now that is just an idea written down, not an actual EIP.

author: sky.cactus
content: For <https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1829>, ideally you would get the current author to make you a co-author of the EIP, and then you can help shepherd it through the process.  If they are unreachable or unwilling, you can create a new EIP which can just be a clone of that one but with a new number and you as the author.
